attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2017-1284

Date: 2017-10-26

Sur recommandation du premier ministre, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que l’honorable Tracey L. Clements, juge de la Cour suprême de l’Île-du-Prince-Édouard, soit nommée juge en chef de la Cour suprême de l’Île-du-Prince-Édouard, et membre d’office de la Cour d’appel de l’Île-du-Prince-Édouard.


The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, advises that the Honourable Tracey L. Clements, a Judge of the Supreme Court of Prince Edward Island, be appointed Chief Justice of the Supreme Court of Prince Edward Island, and a Judge ex officio of the Prince Edward Island Court of Appeal.

The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, advises that the Honourable Tracey L. Clements, a Judge of the Supreme Court of Prince Edward Island, be appointed Chief Justice of the Supreme Court of Prince Edward Island, and a Judge ex officio of the Prince Edward Island Court of Appeal.
